A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Brilliant addition to the Star Wars film cannon. Lost a star for \"dropping\" bombs in zero g\, which was never going to end well\,  and a 4 dot ellipse at the end of the last paragraph of the screen crawl\, which gave my technical author husband hives. Seriously though I enjoyed this film so much\, and both my 11 year old and 9 year old were blown away and are currently unable to sleep and are debating who the little boy at the end was and omg wow he could use the force. It's going to be a long 2 year wait for the conclusion for everyone in my house...
